title: When will CSE Semester 4 results be out?
content: Does anyone have any idea when the results for CSE Sem 4 are going to be released

comments.body: Aren't both released on the same day everytime ?

Is it?

Not very sure, I remember our seniors venting about their results a day before ours, so going by that there should a one day delay.But calendar of events gives a single date (3rd June for this sem)
For 5th and 3rd sem they released it on the same day afaik
I remember 4th sem wala result also in which they horrible marks to everyone and then they re-released results ig for both 4th and 6th sem
